item.title: 以下是 2024 年纳税人将面临的新情况：

item.title: 周三，一头在新奥尔良狂欢节附近被人像扔足球一样扔进垃圾桶后获救的猪宝宝被 "赦免"，并在路易斯安那州的一位立法者那里找到了一个永久的家。
item.description:
A baby pig that was rescued after being tossed like a football near a Mardi Gras event in New Orleans was “pardoned” Wednesday and has found a permanent home with a Louisiana lawmaker. https://t.co/IrDVKA8sVU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 经过几个月的辩论，加纳议会通过了一项有争议的反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者的新法案。
item.description:
Ghana’s parliament has passed a controversial new anti-LGBTQ bill following months of debate that could make it illegal to identify as a member of the LGBTQ community in the West African nation. https://t.co/SwcsUrgpUg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部周三发布了一份严厉的报告，称密西西比州惩教署三所监狱的条件违反了美国宪法。
item.description:
Conditions at three Mississippi Department of Corrections prisons violated the U.S. Constitution, according to a blistering Justice Department report released on Wednesday. https://t.co/1D0Cpahksm

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 尼克斯-本尼迪克特去世后，俄克拉荷马州教育总监因反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者言论而受到抨击。

Oklahoma education superintendent under fire for anti-LGBTQ rhetoric after Nex Benedict's death. https://t.co/bdnlMzX5nM

item.title: "如果他们读不懂一本书，这不是禁书的问题。"课堂文化战争仍在激烈进行，家长们说，重点应该放在学习损失上。
item.description:
"It's not a matter of banning a book if they can't read it."

As classroom culture wars still rage, parents say the focus should be on learning loss. https://t.co/UVRkbakcxY

item.title: 法国总理建议，西方国家应考虑北约部队或许应以非战斗方式部署到乌克兰，以协助乌克兰。

item.title: 棒球明星大谷翔平在自己的 Instagram 账户上宣布，他已经结婚了。这位双向球员于 12 月加盟洛杉矶道奇队，合同破纪录，为期 10 年，价值 7 亿美元。
item.description:
Baseball star Shohei Ohtani announced on his Instagram account that he is married.

The two-way player joined the Los Angeles Dodgers in December on a record-breaking contract worth $700 million over 10 years. https://t.co/FlH3suPbN2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 哈马斯管理的卫生部发言人在一份声明中说，在加沙城西南部拉希德街附近的纳布西环岛发生的事件中，至少有 104 人死亡，760 人受伤：
item.description:
At least 104 people were killed and 760 others were injured in the incident at Al-Nabulsi roundabout near Al-Rashid Street in the southwest of Gaza City, the Hamas-run health ministry spokesperson said in a statement.

item.title: 就在拜登总统和特朗普前总统访问南部边境，强调大选前紧迫的移民问题之际，最近几周越境进入美国的移民人数实际上有所下降，这与过去的季节性趋势一致。
item.description:
As Pres. Biden and former Pres. Trump visit the southern border to highlight the pressing immigration problem heading into the election, the number of migrants crossing into the U.S. has actually declined in recent weeks, in line with past seasonal trends. https://t.co/OcURoh5CmO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 众议院共和党人周四将要求了解是谁决定对白宫和国会隐瞒国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀的住院情况。

item.title: 在纽约审理前总统特朗普的封口费刑事案件时，检察官计划使用这位前总统自己的话--包括《特朗普：交易的艺术》等书中的引文--来指控他：交易的艺术》（The Art of the Deal）等书中的引文，在下个月的庭审中对他不利。
item.description:
Prosecutors in former Pres. Trump's criminal hush money case in New York plan to use the former president's own words — including quotes from books like "Trump: The Art of the Deal" — against him at trial next month, according to court filings. https://t.co/zqpqsgDKdc

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据一份联邦报告称，全球气温升高导致北极冰层融化，海平面上升，这可能会干扰美国几十年前埋藏的冷战时期的核废料。
item.description:
The rise in global temperatures that are causing Arctic ice to melt and sea levels to rise could disturb Cold War-era nuclear waste buried by the U.S. decades ago, according to a federal report. https://t.co/PGWfL0d32k

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局表示，使用全氟辛烷磺酸（PFAS）"永久性化学品 "的食品包装已不再在美国销售。

item.title: 拥有美国和俄罗斯双重国籍的克谢尼娅-卡列琳娜（Ksenia Karelina）预计将于周四在西伯利亚的一家法庭出庭，就其被控叛国罪而遭到的拘留提出上诉。

item.title: 在奥普拉-温弗瑞（Oprah Winfrey）宣布决定不再参加即将于 5 月举行的年度股东大会的董事会改选后，WeightWatchers 的股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌了 25% 以上：
item.description:
Shares in WeightWatchers dropped by more than 25% in premarket trading Thursday after Oprah Winfrey’s announcement that she has decided not to stand for reelection to the board at the upcoming annual meeting of shareholders in May.

Read more: https://t.co/lq062JoVa4 pic.twitter.com/K1OTw8HTvl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024
